education_text.0: Born in      New York City New York City, Floyd finished high school at age 14Floyd became a staff member of the Armour Research Foundation (now      IIT Research Institute IIT Research Institute) at      Illinois Institute of Technology Illinois Institute of Technology in the 1950sFloyd worked closely with      Donald Knuth Donald Knuth, in particular as the major reviewer for Knuth's seminal book      The Art of Computer Programming The Art of Computer Programming, and is the person most cited in that work
